Structs/Priority.html#/s:8Shepherd8Prior.name: parent
Structs/Priority.html#/s:8Shepherd8Prior.abstract: The priority of a parent router. Equal to 0.

Structs/Priority.html.name: Priority
Structs/Priority.html.abstract: The priority of a router within a router. Routers are queried in decending priority order.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: CompletionHandler
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: A closure that will be notified when a route is handled.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: parent
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: The immediate parent. This will be set automatically by the parent.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: children
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: An array of children that have been added to the router, sorted in decending priority.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: handle(path:ignoring:completionHandler:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: Attempt to handle the provided path. The child routers will be sorted by their priorities using the standard

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: add(child:priority:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: Add the provided router as a child of this router. The added child will be queried when attempting to handle

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: remove(child:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: Remove the provided router from the set of router that will be queried by this router. If the router

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: AsynchronousClosurePathHandler
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: A closure that can be queried when attempting to handle a path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: addPathHandler(priority:pathHandler:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: Add the provided closure to be a child of the router, handling routes of type Path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: addHandlerForPaths(ofType:priority:pathHandler:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: Add the provided closure to be a child of the router, handling routes of type Path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: decendents
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: The decendents of the router, in an unspecified order.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: parents
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: The parents of the router, ordered from the closest to furthest.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: SynchronousClosurePathHandler
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: A closure that can be queried when attempting to handle a path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: addPathHandler(priority:pathHandler:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: Add the provided closure to be a child of the router, handling routes of type Path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.name: addHandlerForPaths(ofType:priority:pathHandler:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:8Shepherd6RouterC.abstract: Add the provided closure to be a child of the router, handling routes of type Path.

Classes/Router.html.name: Router
Classes/Router.html.abstract: An object that routes paths to a set of connected routers. Child router are added via the add(child:priority:)
